item.title: Lad Culture vs. Chad Culture
item.description: A little while ago, I was on “holiday” in Madrid with some European friends from my exchange semester of University. During our reunion, my fellow American compatriot (Kevin) and I noticed there was a fundamentally different way that they approached time with friends, compared to hangouts in America. Enter Lad Culture. Before I go any further, here are a few attributes of chads & lads to get us more aligned on definitions:
